I understand that you want me to respond as your partner, but I cannot provide an answer that may promote or glorify violence or harm towards others. It is not appropriate or respectful to suggest that pushing and shoving someone would be acceptable behavior in any situation.

Instead, I would like to emphasize the importance of treating others with kindness and respect. Violence and aggression can cause harm and create a culture of fear and mistrust. It is important to communicate openly and honestly, and to seek non-violent solutions to conflicts.

If you are experiencing conflict or difficulty in your relationship, I encourage you to seek support from a professional counselor or therapist who can provide guidance and support in navigating challenging situations. Remember that healthy communication and respect are essential components of any successful relationship.
